it.polimi.se2018.networking.client

Class ClientImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable<ModelUpdate>
      • it.polimi.se2018.networking.client.ClientImplementation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientNetInterface, Observer<ViewMessage>

    public class ClientImplementation
extends Observable<ModelUpdate>
implements Observer<ViewMessage>, ClientNetInterface
    This class defines what the client does when it receives a message from the network.

    It mocks the behaviour of the model and the controller components in the MVC architecture, so that the network is completely transparent to the views.

    This class is immutable.

    Author:
    dvdmff
